comment.author: 47790224@N07
comment._content: This was on May 18. It took place in different Dutch cities in the years 1934-1939 (in 1934 under a different name). It was a silent demonstration with only the Vrede banner allowed. Much more material can be found in its archives, kept by Aletta, www.aletta.nu/aletta/eng
